issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: We can add more subtlety to perf logging information in TezCompiler
fields.summary: Add more subtlety to TezCompiler Perf Logging

comments.body: [~ashutoshc] can you please see if this is sufficient.
Can you paste sample output for this?
Also, it will be useful to get time spent in generateTaskTree() and optimizeTaskPlan() method.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12796609/HIVE-13407.1.patch

{noformat}

{noformat}

ATTACHMENT ID: 12797139 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
+1 please paste sample output from this new logging.
Actually instead of {{PerfLogger.Optimizer}} we shall use {{PerfLogger.TezCompiler}} for these logs.

Here is the sample output :
{code}
